item.description:
Chris Shiflett returns to Boston this time to introduce the Zend Framework - a high quality and open source framework for developing Web Applications and Web Services. Built in the true PHP spirit, the Zend Framework delivers ease-of-use and powerful functionality, providing solutions for building modern, robust, and secure websites. Chris recently teamed up with php|architect magazine, another Zend Framework partner, to publish a tutorial on getting started with the MVC architecture of the framework.


As always, after any healthy technical discussion food & drink must follow.

We will be meeting at Optaros, a venture backed consulting firm that leverages the benefits of Open Source Software for its clients.

Optaros is located at 60 Canal Street - next to TD Banknorth Garden so there's plenty of nearby parking and access via the Green and Orange Line.

There are no Garden events scheduled for this evening, so parking will not be a problem.

For more information, see http://www.BostonPHP....
item.name: Boston PHP Meetup May Meetup
